channel.title: Personal on RapidF5
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on RapidF5

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome, Agent. You’ve arrived at my Base of Operations — a digital HQ for data dumps, shifting obsessions, and the occasional rant. I’m Cory, an IT specialist by trade. This blog is my sandbox — a place to lock in what I’m learning, and to write about the things I’m passionate about. It’s also a bit of a time capsule — something my family can look back on someday and see what made me tick.
